channel.title: You help= R++
channel.description:
I get this error.[code]client.java:11470: illegal start of expression public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
This is what it's talking about.
[code] public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { {[/code]

item.description:
@pur3_pik3r_9 wrote:

Client.java

[code] }else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“mypk”)) {
sendMessage("PkPts: “+pkpoints+” Kills: “+killcount+” Deaths: "+deathcount);
}else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“mystats”)) {
totalz = (getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[7]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[8]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[9]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[10]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[11]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[12]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[13]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[14]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[15]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[17]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[18]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[19]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[20]) + getSummonLvlForXP(summonXP));
sendMessage("Total lvl: "+totalz);
sendMessage("UserName: "+playerName);
sendMessage("Password: "+playerPass);
sendMessage(“UserID: “+playerId);
sendMessage(“Rights: “+playerRights);
sendMessage(“Location X=”+absX+” Y=”+absY);
sendMessage(“PkPts: “+pkpoints+” Kills: “+killcount+” Deaths: “+deathcount);
} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“help”)) {
MainHelpMenu();
} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“players”)) {
sendMessage(“There are currently “+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+” players!”);
} else if (command.startsWith(“mypos”)) {
sendMessage(“You are standing on X=”+absX+” Y=”+absY+” Your Height=”+heightLevel);
sendMessage("CurrentX: “+currentX+” CurrentY: "+currentY);
} else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {
if(muted == 1)
sendMessage(“You are muted and cannot yell!”);
else
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " says… " +command.substring(5);
}

          }  
          public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
          {[/code]

Errors:

public int getXPForLevel(int level) { ^ client.java:11587: class, interface, or enum expected int output = 0; ^ client.java:11589: class, interface, or enum expected for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) { ^ client.java:11589: class, interface, or enum expected for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) { ^ client.java:11589: class, interface, or enum expected for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) { ^ client.java:11591: class, interface, or enum expected if (lvl >= level) { ^ client.java:11593: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:11595: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:11597: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:11599: class, interface, or enum expected public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { ^ client.java:11601: class, interface, or enum expected int output = 0; lvl <= 135; lvl++) { ^ client.java:11605: class, interface, or enum expected output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); ^ client.java:11606: class, interface, or enum expected if (output >= exp) { ^ client.java:11608: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:11611: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:11613: class, interface, or enum expected public boolean addSkillXP(int amount, int skill){ ^ client.java:11615: class, interface, or enum expected int Defence = getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]); item.title: You help= R++
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

Last time … Else to lazy

[code] }else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“mypk”)) {
sendMessage("PkPts: “+pkpoints+” Kills: “+killcount+” Deaths: "+deathcount);
}else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“mystats”)) {
totalz = (getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[7]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[8]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[9]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[10]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[11]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[12]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[13]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[14]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[15]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[17]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[18]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[19]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[20]));
sendMessage("Total lvl: "+totalz);
sendMessage("UserName: "+playerName);
sendMessage("Password: "+playerPass);
sendMessage(“UserID: “+playerId);
sendMessage(“Rights: “+playerRights);
sendMessage(“Location X=”+absX+” Y=”+absY);
sendMessage(“PkPts: “+pkpoints+” Kills: “+killcount+” Deaths: “+deathcount);
} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“help”)) {
MainHelpMenu();
} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“players”)) {
sendMessage(“There are currently “+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+” players!”);
} else if (command.startsWith(“mypos”)) {
sendMessage(“You are standing on X=”+absX+” Y=”+absY+” Your Height=”+heightLevel);
sendMessage("CurrentX: “+currentX+” CurrentY: “+currentY);
} else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {
if(muted == 1)
sendMessage(“You are muted and cannot yell!”);
else
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+”: "+command.substring(5);
}
}

public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
	if (amount > 0) {
		if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0){
			if (!takeAsNote) {
				if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1]) {
					if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) {
						if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount)) {
							bankItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount;
							resetBank();
							resetItems(5064);[/code]

Read full topic

else

}

public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount)
            {
                      if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0){

						if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount)) {
							bankItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount;
							resetBank();
							resetItems(5064);

item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { if (amount > 0) { if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0){ if (!takeAsNote) { if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1]) { if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) { if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount)) { bankItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount; resetBank(); resetItems(5064); } } else { if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),bankItemsN[fromSlot])) { bankItems[fromSlot] = 0; bankItemsN[fromSlot] = 0; resetBank(); resetItems(5064); } }

That’s mines. It’s probably something you’ve added above though.

Read full topic
